MANIFEST_APP_DESCRIPTION.message: This extension gives you the ability to create rooms and watch online videos with your friends.

ALERT_PARTY_ALREADY_RUNNING.message: Cannot create or join a room here. A room is already running. Refresh the page or create a room in another page.

NAVBAR_USER_ID_COPIED_TO_YOUR_CLIPBOARD.message: User id copied to your clipboard

SETTINGS_USER_NAME_NNOTICE.message: This the name that will appear to other users in rooms.

SETTINGS_SHOW_ACTIONS_NOTICE.message: Show actions other users do in the chat window

SETTINGS_USERNAME_SMALL_ERROR.message: The username must be at least $minLength$ characters

SELECT_VIDEO_SELECT_VIDEO_To_START_PARTY.message: Select a video to start party
Select the video you want to watch the party on.
If no video selection mark is showing, make sure that the video is already playing.

PARTY_ROOM_ID_COPIED.message: Room id copied to your clipboard

PARTY_ROOM_LINK_COPIED.message: Room link copied to your clipboard

NOT_RECOGNISED_PAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED_NOTICE.message: This page is not supported by Luca extension. Please make sure it's a valid page or try to reload it.

FRIENDS_FRIENDS_COMING_SOON_NOTICE.message: Soon you will be able to create your own friends list and invite them to watch movies togother.

DASHBOARD_GET_STARTED_CREATE_OR_JOIN_NOT.message: Click on create to start a new party or enter a room id to join an already existing party.
